problems.title: Check Even or Odd
problems.description: Check if a number is even or odd using bitwise AND operation.

problems.title: Count Set Bits
problems.description: Count the number of 1s (set bits) in the binary representation of a number.

sampleTestCases.explanation: 15 in binary is 1111, which has 4 ones

problems.title: Power of Two Check
problems.description: Check if a number is a power of 2 using bitwise operations.

problems.title: Set Kth Bit
problems.description: Set the kth bit of a number to 1 (0-indexed from right).
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers: n (number) and k (bit position)
problems.outputFormat: Print the number after setting kth bit

problems.title: Clear Kth Bit
problems.description: Clear (set to 0) the kth bit of a number (0-indexed from right).
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers: n (number) and k (bit position)
problems.outputFormat: Print the number after clearing kth bit

problems.title: Toggle Kth Bit
problems.description: Toggle (flip) the kth bit of a number (0-indexed from right).
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers: n (number) and k (bit position)
problems.outputFormat: Print the number after toggling kth bit

problems.title: Check Kth Bit
problems.description: Check if the kth bit of a number is set (1) or not (0-indexed from right).
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers: n (number) and k (bit position)
problems.outputFormat: Print 'Set' if kth bit is 1, else 'Not Set'

problems.title: Multiply by 2
problems.description: Multiply a number by 2 using left shift operator.

problems.title: Divide by 2
problems.description: Divide a number by 2 using right shift operator.

problems.title: Swap Two Numbers
problems.description: Swap two numbers using XOR without using a temporary variable.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers a and b
